name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm

reviews.name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm
reviews.reviewText:
RE: Tinted Lip Balms - Good Colors Go Bad Ones Stay

I came to your site for the very first time today because I LIKE your products BUT I AM UNHAPPY! Why? the same reason as many other have said you seem to not care what we are telling you like. We are telling you because WE WANT to buy your products!Tiger Lily which you evidently choice to "Kill" was the most attractive and universally flattering color of all. I know, I own every color!

Product Manager - Please Hear Us!

1. BRING BACK TIGER LILY.. It was perfect!
2. Carmel Daisy makes you look like you died 3 days ago?! Blue and Brown lips?? Why,...
3. Why even make Red lip balms... Really? Red is for a full-cover product in a Balm it just looks creepy

4. Hibiscus is Pretty Good, But I can never find it???

The stores don't seem to re-stock your products. Don't you want us to buy.. You should most definitely make it easy for them to restock.

I really hope you are listening?! Please bring Back Tiger Lily or sell me the remaining stock??

From: A 43 year Old Professional Woman (who is trying to be a loyal customer - but challenged by your Product decisions)
reviews.title: Please LISTEN to your Customers!!!

reviews.name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm
reviews.reviewText: This balm is amazing. I'm in high school so I wake up at six o'clock every morning and therefore don't have a whole lot of time to put on make up. But this balm is all I need. It's moisturizing and the color is just enough. It's not to much or too little that you couldn't tell. I use pink blossom.
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm
reviews.reviewText: I am a huge fan of tinted lip balms, but many of them are disappointing. Sometimes they aren't moisturizing enough and others the color is awful. This one is great! I own all of the colors except Tiger Lily, which I am planning on getting soon. Currently, Rose is my very favorite and may buy an extra to keep in my purse at all times. I have to echo the comments on packaging. The cardboard tube is just ridiculous, especially when ALL your other lip products aren't done this way.
reviews.title: Best tinted lip balm ever!

reviews.name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm
reviews.reviewText: It gives a healthy and natural look. Very good in moisturizing. Best part is that it is all antural!
reviews.title: Great

reviews.name: Tinted Lip Balm-Pink Blossom Burt's Bees 0.15 oz Lip Balm
reviews.reviewText: This product provides the perfect amount of lip balm protection and just the right amount of pigment. I love Burt's and Bee's so much, every product is executed to perfection and it's natural ingredients work great with my skin. The brand is so versatile that there is something for everyone's benefit.
reviews.title: Tinted lip balm
